DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the efficacy and safety of Nexavar ® in advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC) and calculation of related medical costs.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial to Evaluate the Characteristics of Patients Treated for Advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma With Nexavar ®
DOC.criteria: Patients with diagnosis of advanced RCC and decision taken by the investigator to prescribe Nexavar®. The patients should have sufficient knowledge of French or Dutch to be able to participate in the Study Exclusion criteria must be read in conjunction with the Belgian product information
